mapper.select: SELECT SEQ_SLE , SLE_NM , CD_WHERE_CTG , PRICE_SALE , CD_STATE_SALE , CORP_NM , TO_CHAR(DT_SALE_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') dt_sale_start , TO_CHAR(DT_SALE_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') dt_sale_end FROM TB_SLE WHERE REGISTER = #{register} AND SEQ_SLE = #{seq_sle}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_SLE (SEQ_SLE, SLE_NM, PRICE_SALE, IMG, DESCES, CD_CTG_B, CD_CTG_M, CD_STATE_SALE, PRD_TYPE, COUNT_STOCK, CORP_NM, FLG_DELETE, DT_SALE_START, DT_SALE_END, DISCOUNT, DT_REG, REGISTER, POINT_STACK) VALUES (SQ_SEQ_SLE.NEXTVAL, #{sle_nm}, #{price_sale}, #{img}, #{desces}, #{cd_ctg_b}, #{cd_ctg_m}, #{cd_state_sale}, #{prd_type}, #{count_stock}, #{corp_nm}, 'N', TO_DATE(#{dt_sale_start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{dt_sale_end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{discount}, SYSDATE, #{register}, #{point_stack})
